titles.title: Defend the Blend Act
Defend the Blend Act
A bill to prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from retroactively reducing certain determinations under the Renewable Fuel Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Defend the Blend Act
This bill prohibits the Environmental Protection Agency from reducing under the renewable fuel program any applicable volume, or any renewable fuel obligation or applicable percentage that has already been finalized for any calendar year.
